## a.id() function

A unique identifier scalar type. This scalar is serialized like a String but isn't meant to be human-readable. If not specified on create operations, a ULID will be auto-generated service-side.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function id(): ModelField<Nullable<string>, never, undefined, ModelFieldType.Id>;
```
**Returns:**

[ModelField](./data-schema.modelfield.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Nullable](./data-schema.nullable.md)<!-- -->&lt;string&gt;, never, undefined, [ModelFieldType.Id](./data-schema.modelfieldtype.md)<!-- -->&gt;

ID field definition
